title: Sense and Sensibility - final paragraph understood

content.question: The final paragraph is best understood as an attempt by Marianne to

choices.label: clarify her views about Colonel Brandon
reconsider her objections to Colonel Brandon
demonstrate her maturity to Mrs. Dashwood
express her frustration with Mrs. Dashwood

content.answer: clarify her views about Colonel Brandon

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
